# Roadmap

> Repeatable file template — copy into `docs/project/roadmap.md` (or archived equivalents) when establishing a long-range plan for a new project.

> Capture long-horizon objectives and the milestones needed to reach them. Keep sections outcome-focused; link to working-roadmap items for near-term execution.

## Vision Statement

- One paragraph describing the desired end-state.

## Pillars / Themes

- Theme 1 – description
- Theme 2 – description
- Theme 3 – description

## Milestones

### Phase 1 – <Name / Quarter>

- Goal A – why it matters, success measures, linked specs/features
- Goal B – ...

### Phase 2 – <Name / Quarter>

- ...

### Phase 3 – <Name / Quarter>

- ...

## Risks & Dependencies

- Risk 1 – mitigation / owner
- Dependency 1 – expected resolution date

## Metrics & Checkpoints

- KPIs to monitor progress.
- Cadence for review (e.g., monthly steering meeting).

## Revision Log

- YYYY-MM-DD – Summary of update (by whom)
